Description: Awesome 2 bedroom 2 bathroom in Allston. Very close to Packard's Corner and Boston University. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Nice wood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Open kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Washer and dryer in unit. Parking is available for rent. No broker fee. Call now!
